columns.name: GTM_TR_CONTROL_SCREEN_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line control code.

columns.name: GTM_TR_CONTROL_SCREEN_XID
columns.description: The XID for the GTM trade transaction line control code.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the compliance rule set group used to assign the control type/control code to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the compliance rule used to assign the control type/control code to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_EXCEPTION_CONTROL_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the exception control type assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_EXCEPTION_CONTROL_CODE
columns.description: The exception control code assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_REGULATION_REFERENCE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the regulation reference associated with the control assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_CONTROL_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the control type assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: CONTROL_CODE
columns.description: The control code assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: LICENSE_NUMBER
columns.description: The license number associated with the license used to release a control on the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: LICENSE_QUANTITY
columns.description: The quantity from the associated license used to release a control on the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: LICENSE_UOM
columns.description: The unit of measured for the quantity from the associated license used to release a control on the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: LICENSE_ADDED_BY
columns.description: Specifies who added the license to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: LICENSE_ADDED_ON
columns.description: Specifies the date on which the license is added to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the user who updated the control screening data.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent update for the control screening data.

columns.name: GTM_CONTROL_CATEGORY
columns.description: The control category associated with the control type/control code assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_REGISTRATION_GID
columns.description: The GID for the registration associated with the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: INVOLVED_PARTY_QUAL_GID
columns.description: The GID for the involved party associated with the control code assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: EXCEPTION_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the compliance rule used to assign the exception control type/control code to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_AUTHORIZATION_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The authorization type of the  license number associated with the license used to release a control on the GTM trade transaction line.
